item.title: Church Numerals in Ruby
item.description: Church Numerals in Ruby A quick and dirty introduction to numbers in λ calculus, with a twist of Ruby. Necessary Preface I have zero Ruby experience prior to this. All my Ruby knowledge comes from putting this together. However, Ruby has some very nice syntactic sugar with lambdas that I’ll take full advantage of. Try out some of the code blocks in irb! So, what syntactic sugar? Here’s some of the syntax that I use (and think is cool!
